segments.source_content:
---
slug: /152
title: "This Week In React #152: React 18, RSC, Kuma UI, Expo 49, Next.js, Remix DevTools, Fresh, React-Query, Redwood, Catalyst, Million, MDXEditor, Ariakit, Rewind, TC39, Prettier..."
authors: [slorber]
date: 07-18-2023
---
I've just got back from holiday in French Brittany 😎, so we're covering 2 weeks of news in this edition.

translations.zh-hant: 我剛從法國布列塔尼度假回來😎，因此本期將涵蓋兩週的新聞。

segments.source_content: I thought it was going to be a quiet summer, but there have been quite a few releases and plenty of articles on Server Components! 😄

translations.zh-hant: 我以為這會是個平靜的夏天，但卻有不少版本發布以及許多關於伺服器元件的文章！😄

segments.source_content: **💡 [Check this newsletter on Twitter](https://slo.im/thread) - visual format 🎨**

translations.zh-hant: **💡 [在 Twitter 上查看本通訊](https://slo.im/thread) - 視覺格式 🎨**

segments.source_content: [![Tina.io is a headless CMS for Markdown-powered sites](/emails/issues/140/tinacms.jpg)](https://tina.io/?utm_source=newsletter&utm_term=this-week-in-react)

translations.zh-hant: [![Tina.io 是一個為 Markdown 驅動的網站而生的無頭 CMS](/emails/issues/140/tinacms.jpg)](https://tina.io/?utm_source=newsletter&utm_term=this-week-in-react)

segments.source_content: **[Tina.io is a headless CMS for Markdown-powered sites](https://tina.io/?utm_source=newsletter&utm_term=this-week-in-react)**

translations.zh-hant: **[Tina.io 是一個為 Markdown 驅動的網站而生的無頭 CMS](https://tina.io/?utm_source=newsletter&utm_term=this-week-in-react)**

segments.source_content:
- Editing UI for your Markdown files
- UI for MDX components
- Supports static (SSG) and server-side rendering (SSR)
- Option for visual editing (live-preview)
- Build with reusable blocks

translations.zh-hant:
- 為你的 Markdown 檔案提供編輯介面
- 用於 MDX 元件的介面
- 支援靜態（SSG）和伺服器端渲染（SSR）
- 可選視覺化編輯（即時預覽）
- 使用可重複使用的區塊構建

segments.source_content: Comprehensive, well-illustrated article on React 18 and its impact on performance. Explains how Concurrent React works and its impact on metrics such as Total Blocking Time and Interaction to Next Paint. Also presents other new features such as the Transition API, React Server Components, Suspense and the new React cache.

translations.zh-hant: 關於 React 18 及其對效能影響的全面且圖文並茂的文章。解釋了並行 React 的工作原理及其對總阻塞時間（Total Blocking Time）和交互到下一次繪製（Interaction to Next Paint）等指標的影響。同時也介紹了其他新功能，例如過渡 API（Transition API）、React 伺服器元件（React Server Components）、Suspense 以及新的 React 快取（cache）。

segments.source_content: New CSS-in-JS library inspired by the DX offered by Chakra UI, and compatible with React Server Components. The library is based on a unique hybride method that combines the best of zero-runtime CSS-in-JS and traditional runtime solutions. We'll have to study all this, and see how this library stands up to [Panda CSS](https://panda-css.com/) from the Chakra team.

translations.zh-hant: 新的 CSS-in-JS 函式庫，靈感來自 Chakra UI 提供的開發者體驗（DX），並與 React 伺服器元件相容。該函式庫基於一種獨特的混合方法，結合了零執行時 CSS-in-JS 和傳統執行時解決方案的優點。我們必須研究這一切，並看看這個函式庫如何與來自 Chakra 團隊的 [Panda CSS](https://panda-css.com/) 相抗衡。

segments.source_content:
- 🐦 [DevRel Matt Carroll rejoined the React team](https://twitter.com/mattcarrollcode/status/1681342638816112641)
- 👀 [How to Setup Redwood Experimental React Server Components](https://community.redwoodjs.com/t/react-server-components-rsc/5081)
- 👀 [React-Query-Nextjs](https://twitter.com/TkDodo/status/1680153231853223938): React-Query experimental support for the Next.js App Directory.
- 📜 [My take on the current React & Server Components controversy](https://phryneas.de/react-server-components-controversy): Lenz loves the React Server Components but explains his frustration as a maintainer of Apollo Client and Redux Toolkit.
- 📜 [Demystifying React Server Components with NextJS 13 App Router](https://demystifying-rsc.vercel.app/): a great demo application with well-illustrated notes explaining how Server Components work, including many code and network payload samples.
- 📜 [5 Common Pitfalls with Server Components in Next13 (with examples)](https://www.propelauth.com/post/5-common-pitfalls-with-server-components-in-next13-with-examples): well-illustrated article presenting the most common errors when using Server Components.
- 📜 [Trimming typography with Capsize](https://www.skovy.dev/blog/using-capsize-with-stitches): explains how to trim and normalise whitespaces around your fonts to facilitate alignment, in a React context.
- 📜 [SvelteJS: My ecosystem is bigger than yours](https://hackmd.io/@roguegpu/r1RKQMdt3): interesting criticism of React in favour of Svelte, which doesn't need as much of an ecosystem.
- 📜 [Why Server Components - A Brief History of Web](https://www.perssondennis.com/articles/why-server-components-a-brief-history-of-web)
- 📜 [A Visual Guide to Prefetching in Next.js 13](https://www.builder.io/blog/prefetching-nextjs-visual-guide)
- 📜 [Autosave form inputs with Remix](https://www.jacobparis.com/content/remix-form-autosave)
- 📜 [Ariakit is now stable](https://newsletter.ariakit.org/p/stable)
- 📜 [A pattern for chaining nextjs middlewares](https://raphael.badia.cc/posts/a-pattern-for-chaining-middlewares)
- 📜 [Embracing Polymorphism for Flexible Components](https://brightinventions.pl/blog/embracing-polymorphism-for-flexible-components/)
- 📦 [Fresh 1.3 – Simplified Route Components and More](https://twitter.com/deno_land/status/1681340646723039232)
- 📦 [Next.js 13.4.10](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/releases/tag/v13.4.10)
- 📦 [Million.js 2.5 - Compile time macros](https://twitter.com/aidenybai/status/1679698685603774464)
- 📦 [Remix Development Tools](https://twitter.com/AlemTuzlak59192/status/1680538200702369794)
- 📦 [Remix-Hono](https://github.com/sergiodxa/remix-hono)
- 📦 [Remix-JSON-Routes](https://github.com/brophdawg11/remix-json-routes)
- 📦 [Vercel Platforms Starter Kit - Template for building multi-tenant applications using Next.js App Router](https://vercel.com/blog/platforms-starter-kit)
- 📦 [MDX Editor - WYSIWYG React component for Markdown editing](https://mdxeditor.dev/)
- 📦 [Rewind-UI - React-TailwindCSS component library](https://rewind-ui.dev/)
- 📦 [Featurevisor - Git-based Feature flags, with React bindings](https://github.com/fahad19/featurevisor)
- 🎥 [Tailwind Connect 2023 — Keynote](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CLkxRnRQtDE): annonce de Catalyst, un React UI kit
- 🎥 [Legend: The Ultimate React State Manager?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E4TH77SMOG8)

translations.zh-hant:
- 🐦 [開發者關係負責人 Matt Carroll 重新加入 React 團隊](https://twitter.com/mattcarrollcode/status/1681342638816112641)
- 👀 [如何設定 Redwood 實驗性 React 伺服器元件](https://community.redwoodjs.com/t/react-server-components-rsc/5081)
- 👀 [React-Query-Nextjs](https://twitter.com/TkDodo/status/1680153231853223938)：React-Query 對 Next.js App Directory 的實驗性支援。
- 📜 [我對當前 React & 伺服器元件爭議的看法](https://phryneas.de/react-server-components-controversy)：Lenz 熱愛 React 伺服器元件，但解釋了他作為 Apollo Client 和 Redux Toolkit 維護者的挫折感。
- 📜 [透過 NextJS 13 App Router 解密 React 伺服器元件](https://demystifying-rsc.vercel.app/)：附帶詳細註解的示範應用程式，展示伺服器元件運作原理，包含程式碼與網路負載範例。
- 📜 [Next13 中使用伺服器元件的 5 個常見陷阱（附範例）](https://www.propelauth.com/post/5-common-pitfalls-with-server-components-in-next13-with-examples)：圖文並茂地介紹使用伺服器元件時最常見的錯誤。
- 📜 [使用 Capsize 修剪排版](https://www.skovy.dev/blog/using-capsize-with-stitches)：說明在 React 環境中如何修剪並標準化字體周圍的空白以利對齊。
- 📜 [SvelteJS：我的生態系統比你的更大](https://hackmd.io/@roguegpu/r1RKQMdt3)：對 React 的有趣批判，主張 Svelte 不需要龐大生態系統。
- 📜 [為何需要伺服器元件 - 網頁簡史](https://www.perssondennis.com/articles/why-server-components-a-brief-history-of-web)
- 📜 [Next.js 13 預取功能的視覺指南](https://www.builder.io/blog/prefetching-nextjs-visual-guide)
- 📜 [使用 Remix 自動儲存表單輸入](https://www.jacobparis.com/content/remix-form-autosave)
- 📜 [Ariakit 現已穩定](https://newsletter.ariakit.org/p/stable)
- 📜 [鏈接 NextJS 中介軟體的模式](https://raphael.badia.cc/posts/a-pattern-for-chaining-middlewares)
- 📜 [擁抱多型以實現靈活元件](https://brightinventions.pl/blog/embracing-polymorphism-for-flexible-components/)
- 📦 [Fresh 1.3 – 簡化的路由元件與更多功能](https://twitter.com/deno_land/status/1681340646723039232)
- 📦 [Next.js 13.4.10](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/releases/tag/v13.4.10)
- 📦 [Million.js 2.5 - 編譯時期巨集](https://twitter.com/aidenybai/status/1679698685603774464)
- 📦 [Remix 開發工具](https://twitter.com/AlemTuzlak59192/status/1680538200702369794)
- 📦 [Remix-Hono](https://github.com/sergiodxa/remix-hono)
- 📦 [Remix-JSON-Routes](https://github.com/brophdawg11/remix-json-routes)
- 📦 [Vercel Platforms Starter Kit - 使用 Next.js App Router 建置多租戶應用程式的範本](https://vercel.com/blog/platforms-starter-kit)
- 📦 [MDX Editor - 用於 Markdown 編輯的所見即所得 React 元件](https://mdxeditor.dev/)
- 📦 [Rewind-UI - React-TailwindCSS 元件庫](https://rewind-ui.dev/)
- 📦 [Featurevisor - 基於 Git 的功能開關，附 React 綁定](https://github.com/fahad19/featurevisor)
- 🎥 [Tailwind Connect 2023 — 主題演講](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CLkxRnRQtDE)：宣布 Catalyst，一套 React UI 套件
- 🎥 [Legend：終極 React 狀態管理器？](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E4TH77SMOG8)

segments.source_content: Porkbun offers hundreds of domain extensions for React and React-Native developers from .dev and .app to .cloud, .xyz, and .ai — all at the **lowest prices around!** Every domain name at Porkbun comes with **tons of free features** like:

translations.zh-hant: Porkbun 為 React 和 React-Native 開發者提供數百種網域後綴，從 .dev、.app 到 .cloud、.xyz 和 .ai — 全部提供**業界最低價！** 每個 Porkbun 網域名稱都包含**大量免費功能**，例如：

segments.source_content:
- SSL Certificates
- WHOIS Privacy
- DNS
- URL Forwarding
- Web and Email Hosting Trials

translations.zh-hant:
- SSL 憑證
- WHOIS 隱私保護
- DNS 服務
- URL 轉址
- 網站與電子郵件託管試用

segments.source_content: Check out our **AI Generated Search tool** that’s changing the way people look for domain names. All this is backed by **incredible support 365 days a year** plus thousands of real five-star reviews on Trustpilot.

translations.zh-hant: 體驗我們**AI 生成搜尋工具**，它正在改變人們尋找網域名稱的方式。所有服務皆由**全年 365 天卓越支援**保障，並在 Trustpilot 獲得數千則真實五星評價。

segments.source_content: Click the link and [get $1 off your next domain name registration](https://porkbun.com/?coupon=TWIREACT&utm_source=TWIREACT&utm_medium=Newsletter&utm_campaign=twirjune2023) at Porkbun.com!

translations.zh-hant: 點擊連結，在 Porkbun.com [註冊下個網域可享 1 美元折扣](https://porkbun.com/?coupon=TWIREACT&utm_source=TWIREACT&utm_medium=Newsletter&utm_campaign=twirjune2023)！

segments.source_content: The new SDK 49 has just been released. Many new features have been announced, including my favourites:

translations.zh-hant: 新版 SDK 49 已正式發布，主要亮點功能包括：

segments.source_content:
- React Native 0.72.3, React Native Web 0.19.6
- Expo Router v2.0
- Network debugging, VS Code debugging
- React devtools built-in
- Environment variables
- Local Expo Modules
- EAS Insights

translations.zh-hant:
- React Native 0.72.3, React Native Web 0.19.6
- Expo Router v2.0
- 網路偵錯、VS Code 偵錯
- 內建 React 開發工具
- 環境變數支援
- 本地 Expo 模組
- EAS Insights 分析工具

segments.source_content: Along with SDK 49, Expo is also announcing the release of Expo Router v2 with many enhancements, including:

translations.zh-hant: 配合 SDK 49 發布，Expo 同時推出 Expo Router v2，強化功能包含：

segments.source_content:
- TypeScript support
- Static routes, SEO, Head metadata
- Async routes
- Universal Linking, handoff
- CSS and Styling

translations.zh-hant:
- TypeScript 支援
- 靜態路由、SEO、Head 元數據
- 非同步路由
- 通用連結與 Handoff 接力
- CSS 與樣式系統

🧑‍💼 [**Passionfroot - 資深全端工程師 (Remix) - €160k+，柏林/遠端**](https://passionfroot.recruitee.com/o/senior-fullstack-engineer)

segments.source_content: Passionfroot's mission is to empower the independent businesses of tomorrow via YouTube, Podcasts, Social Media, and Newsletters. Join us in building a tool that will empower creators globally to build scalable, sustainable businesses.

translations.zh-hant: Passionfroot 的使命是透過 YouTube、Podcast、社群媒體和電子報，賦能未來的獨立事業。加入我們，共同打造能讓全球創作者建立可擴展、可持續商業模式的工具。

segments.source_content: 🧑‍💼 [**Callstack - Senior React Native Developer - Fully Remote, PLN 21-32k net on B2B, monthly**](https://www.callstack.com/senior-react-native-developer)

translations.zh-hant: 🧑‍💼 [**Callstack - 資深 React Native 開發者 - 全遠端，B2B 合約月薪淨額 PLN 21-32k**](https://www.callstack.com/senior-react-native-developer)

segments.source_content: Do you want to work on the world's most used apps? Would you like to co-create the React Native technology? Join the Callstack team of React & React Native leaders. Check our website for more details. We are looking forward to seeing your application - show us what you've got!

translations.zh-hant: 您想開發全球最多人使用的應用程式嗎？您希望共同創造 React Native 技術嗎？加入由 React 和 React Native 領導者組成的 Callstack 團隊。詳情請參閱我們的網站。我們期待看到您的申請——展現您的實力！

segments.source_content: We have several roles open for developers focused on React Native! Pay is ~160k plus 10% bonus. You must have production experience with RN and be based in the US. DM [@gabe_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i) to learn more and don't forget to mention This Week in React.

translations.zh-hant: 我們有多個專注 React Native 的開發職缺！薪資約 16 萬美元外加 10% 獎金。需具備 RN 實際生產經驗且位於美國境內。私訊 [@gabe_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i) 了解詳情，別忘了提及 This Week in React。
